title: Bitter Edge
description: He was sent to put my body and dreams back together. Were they things I even wanted anymore?Spencer Broten was a pain in my backside from the moment we met.I was conned into going on a road trip with him. Within hours, I was realizing he wasn't just my trainer. He was much more.This unnamed, unplanned winding road turned into us getting to know each other as we truly were. Two broken bodies, two broken souls finding out we were more the same than different.The line between hate and love is a bitter edge.Outside or inside. Where will we land?
author: Ariana Rose
